name: requestly
description: Requestly is a self-hosted tool to intercept, modify, and mock network requests. It includes advanced rules, debugging tools, and a browser-like UI for developers.
features: Request interception: Capture and modify HTTP/HTTPS requests before they reach servers.
Response mocking: Return custom responses for testing without backend changes.
Header modification: Add, remove, or change request and response headers dynamically.
URL redirection: Redirect requests to different endpoints for testing or debugging.
Query parameter manipulation: Modify URL parameters on the fly to test different scenarios.
Request blocking: Block specific requests to simulate failures or test error handling.
Script injection: Insert custom JavaScript into pages for testing or debugging.
Session recording: Capture network activity for later analysis and debugging.
Rule management: Create and organize modification rules with conditions and priorities.
Browser extension: Install extensions for Chrome and Firefox to intercept browser traffic.
Team collaboration: Share rules and configurations with team members for consistent testing.
API testing: Test REST APIs by modifying requests and responses without code changes.
